javadoc:
A interface that filters out all files 
 except for those type extensions that it knows about.
 Extensions are of the type ".foo", which is typically found on
 Windows and Unix boxes, but not on Macinthosh. Case is ignored.

methods.name: accept
methods.comment:
Tests whether or not the specified abstract pathname should be
 included in a pathname list.

params.name: pathname
params.comment: The abstract pathname to be tested

return.comment:
true if and only if pathname
          should be included

methods.javadoc:
Returns the description of this filter.
@return the description of this filter
methods.name: getDescription
methods.comment: Returns the description of this filter.

name: GhidraFileFilter
comment:
A interface that filters out all files 
 except for those type extensions that it knows about.
 Extensions are of the type ".foo", which is typically found on
 Windows and Unix boxes, but not on Macinthosh. Case is ignored.

fields.javadoc: A default implementation that shows all files.
fields.name: ALL
fields.comment: A default implementation that shows all files.
